title: Demons and Wizards
description:
Demons & Wizards Discography
Style: Metal
Official site: www.demons-wizards.com


Demons & Wizards is a project featuring Jon Schaffer of Iced Earth and Hansi KÃƒÂ¼rsch of Blind Guardian. Combining the heavy crunch and dark melodies of Iced Earth with the powerful vocals and bombastic choirs of Blind Guardian, Demons & Wizards sounds just like a combination of those two excellent bands, and at the same time, creates something entirely unique.

Jon and Hansi have been both friends and fans of each other&#039;s work for many years, and have long wanted to create some music with each other. They&#039;ve finally managed to squeeze some time out of their busy schedules with their own bands to create two albums together.
